page.title: 03The Glade.
page.content: The Glade is a{public park}consisting of tended gardens, small lake and a Manor House (now used as an adult education centre).It is situated next to Chislehurst and Sidcup grammar school. The{gardens}have colourful flower beds, shrubs and bushes,and a variety of trees and{wildlife.}The pondlife includes frogs, ducks, fish, dragonflies etc. Due to anglers' lead pellets the number of swans has declined, but recently the{lake}has been cleaned. There are different types of trees: several pine, ash, cedar, lime, oak, sweet and horse chestnut,cocher beech, holly and rhodedendron. All these aspects of the park make it a area of{natural beauty}in the centre of suburban Sidcup.
